names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Herba Bidentis Herba Bidens Bipinnata - Gui Zhen Cao - 鬼针草

category: Herbs That Drain Dampness (Diuretics) Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Reduces inflammation, clears Heat, removes toxicity and promotes urination
annotations: clears Heat and Dampness from the Intestines

indications: Appendicitis, nephritis, dysentery, urinary tract infection, cystitis, diabetes, jaundice and hepatitis

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, dissipates Blood Stasis, reduces swelling, drains pus and generates flesh
Disperses Stasis, eases pain and treats incised wounds

contraindications: Use caution for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
